text:
25 new buses

flagged off

Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Tuesday launched 25 new buses for the Coimbatore Division of Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation (TNSTC).

While five of the buses were flagged off from Chennai, the rest were handed over to drivers at the TNSTC divisional headquarters on Mettupalayam Road. These buses were replacement for old and worn out buses that had crossed the number of kilometres it should have been on the road.

These mofussil buses include 12 for Coimbatore, six for Erode and seven for Tirupur districts.

Managing Director of

TNSTC, Coimbatore, R. Thangavelu and other

officials were present at the event.

Awareness camp

Secretary of the District

Legal Services Authority (DLSA) V. John Mino elaborated on the ill effects

of using drugs on individual and society in an awareness programme at Suburban Matriculation Higher Secondary School here

on Tuesday.

At the camp, students were also explained the functioning of DLSA, and how students could make use of it.
